text: Hey, guys, have you ever thought about
What you might want to be when you grow up?
Lots of times!
Maybe once or twice…
Yeah, it’s gonna be a FOREVER long time till
WE grow up!
No, it won’t!  You’d be amazed how fast time flies.
Yeah, look at how old Noah and I are already!
I wanna show you something I just found.
Look at this!
Ooh, look, costumes!
Let’s try ‘em on!
Great idea!
When I grow up I could be a scientist
Paleontologist Diggin’ up bones of dinosaurs
When I grow up I could be a doctor
Just for kids and toddlers
Make ‘em feel better than before
Maybe I'll be a dancer
Leaping across the stage and screen
Maybe I'll be a writer Of stories for a magazine
When I grow up When I grow up
When I grow up I could join the police force
Ride on a white horse Solving crimes would be my game
When I grow up I could be a firefighter
Puttin’ out fires Saving people from the flame!
Maybe I'll be a pilot So I can fly to anywhere!
Maybe I’ll be an astronaut Finding forms of life out there
When I grow up When I grow up
Hey!  How about when I grow up I wanna be a SUPERHERO!
But you already are a superhero!!!
When I grow up I could be a teacher
My kids’ll be readers And they’ll do math in their head
When I grow up I’ll be a baseball player
Champion skater Or play basketball instead
Maybe I'll be an actor In movies and plays, or on TV
Maybe I'll be a popstar the world will sing along with me!
When I grow up When I grow up
That was FUN!!
